title: factor out ReRankQParserPlugin.ReRankQueryRescorer private class
description: To reduce the number of rescorer objects potentially created and also towards (more) code sharing with SOLR-8542.

comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content: Joel Bernstein and everyone, would you have any thoughts on this small proposed refactor? Hoping to commit it later this week or early next week ideally. Thank you.
